title: 'Hospitality seen getting 29% more investments at $436 million this year'
description: The Indian hospitality sector was set to attract $436 million in investments by year-end, a 29% increase from last year. JLL's forecast suggested growth momentum with a rise in consumption and population. Indiaâ€™s hotel transactions might surpass the Maldives and approach Thailand's levels, showcasing notable growth since the COVID-19 pandemic.
